i1.name: Glorious Evolution
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Viktor''' can augment his basic [[champion ability|abilities]] after gaining 100 ''Hex Fragments'', he obtains them by [[kill]]ing enemy units:
* {{tip|Minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} grant 1 ''Hex Fragment''.
* Large minions grant 5 ''Hex Fragments''.
* {{tip|Champion}} {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} grant 25 ''Hex Fragments''.
{{ai|Chaos Storm|Viktor}} becomes augmented once all of '''Viktor's''' basic abilities have been augmented.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Viktor can augment his basic champion ability after gaining 100 Hex Fragments, he obtains them by killing enemy units:
* Minions and monsters grant 1 Hex Fragment.
* Large minions grant 5 Hex Fragments.
* Champion takedowns grant 25 Hex Fragments.
Chaos Storm becomes augmented once all of Viktor's basic abilities have been augmented.

q1.name: Siphon Power
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' hurls a device at the target enemy that deals them {{as|magic damage}} upon arrival. Additionally, '''Viktor''' {{tip|shield|shields}} himself for {{pp|30 to 115}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds and gains {{ai|Discharge|Viktor}} for {{fd|3.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|Discharge:}} '''Viktor's''' next [[basic attack]] becomes a {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}} and is modified to deal {{as|magic damage}}.

{{sbc|{{ai|Augment- Turbocharge|Viktor|Augment: Turbocharge}}:}} '''Viktor''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds after the device hits and increases the shield's value by 60%, up to {{pp|30*1.6 to 115*1.6}} {{as|(+ 32% AP)}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Viktor hurls a device at the target enemy that deals them magic damage upon arrival. Additionally, Viktor shields himself for 30undefined − 115undefined (based on level) (+ 20% AP) for 2.5 seconds and gains Discharge for 3.5 seconds.
Discharge: Viktor's next basic attack becomes a non-projectile and is modified to deal magic damage.
Augment: Turbocharge: Viktor gains 30% bonus movement speed for 2.5 seconds after the device hits and increases the shield's value by 60%, up to 30*1.6undefined − 115*1.6undefined (based on level) (+ 32% AP).
q1.notes:
* All damage dealt by {{nie|Spellblade}} on the enhanced attack is converted into {{as|magic damage}}.
* ''Discharge'' does not apply to [[structure]]s nor will it be consumed against them.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent '''Viktor''' from gaining ''Discharge''.
* {{tip|Critical strike}} and {{sti|life steal|link=true}} only interact with the basic attack damage component.
* If the target dies, becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, or '''Viktor''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time, ''Siphon Power'' cancels but does not go on {{sti|cooldown}} nor consumes any {{tip|mana}}.
* Only the initial projectile can be {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}.
* ''Discharge's'' empowered attack can be {{tip|blocked}} (damage is negated and the empowered attack will still be consumed).
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Discharge's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}} and {{tip|blind}}).

w1.name: Gravity Field
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' deploys a gravitational imprisonment device at the target location for 4 seconds. The trap arms after {{fd|0.75}} seconds and {{tip|slow|slows}} all enemies within the zone, persisting for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving the area or generating 3 stacks.

Enemies within the zone generate a [[stack]] every {{fd|0.5}} seconds. At 3 stacks, they are {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} and {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds but they become immune to the {{tip|slow}} from ''Gravity Field'' and cannot generate stacks again. This may only occur once per cast.
{{sbc|{{ai|Augment- Magnetize|Viktor|Augment: Magnetize}}:}} '''Viktor's''' other abilities, excluding {{ais|Chaos Storm|Viktor}} persistent damage, {{tip|slow}} enemies hit by 20% for 1 second.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Viktor deploys a gravitational imprisonment device at the target location for 4 seconds. The trap arms after 0.75 seconds and slows all enemies within the zone, persisting for 0.25 seconds after leaving the area or generating 3 stacks.
Enemies within the zone generate a stack every 0.5 seconds. At 3 stacks, they are knocked down and stunned for 1.5 seconds but they become immune to the slow from Gravity Field and cannot generate stacks again. This may only occur once per cast.
Augment: Magnetize: Viktor's other abilities, excluding Chaos Storm's persistent damage, slow enemies hit by 20% for 1 second.
w1.notes:
* ''Gravity Field'' will remain active if '''Viktor''' dies.
* ''Gravity Field's'' animation can be seen by both teams through [[Sight|fog of war]].
* If an enemy enters the area of effect while {{tip|untargetable}}, they may generate stacks even after becoming stunned once, causing them to get stunned up-to 3 times by a single ''Gravity Field''.{{bug}} <!-- Bugged since precisely 11.1-->

e1.name: Death Ray
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' uses his synthetic arm to fire an energy beam down the target path, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit within the area.
{{sbc|{{ai|Augment- Aftershock|Viktor|Augment: Aftershock}}:}} An explosion follows in ''Death Ray's'' wake after 1 second, dealing additional {{as|magic damage}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Viktor uses his synthetic arm to fire an energy beam down the target path, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit within the area.
Augment: Aftershock: An explosion follows in Death Ray's wake after 1 second, dealing additional magic damage.
leveling: {{st|{{ai|Augment- Aftershock|Viktor|Aftershock}} Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 140}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|70+20 to 230+140}} {{as|(+ 130% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* '''Viktor''' may freely act while the ray is traveling.
** The effected area is set upon casting, no matter how far away '''Viktor''' moves. Unlike a leash, ''Death Ray'' will not break off its own effect.
* The laser grants a moderate area of {{tip|sight}} around where the beam strikes the ground.
* If ''Death Ray'' is {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}, the initial ray is not destroyed.
** However, the capability to be blocked only applies to the laser as it hits the ground. '''Viktor''' can cast the ability ''over'' the wall and it will not be destroyed or intercepted. 
** ''Augmented Death Ray'' will still cause the entire target area to explode even if the laser is blocked.
* If '''Viktor''' dies while he is firing the beam it only deals damage up to the location at the time of his death.

r1.name: Chaos Storm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' conjures a singularity at the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area and {{tip|disrupt|disrupting}} their {{tip|channel|channeled abilities}}. The singularity then remains active for {{fd|6.5}} seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within its storm every second over the duration and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area it covers. The singularity targets its nearest champion hit by its initial damage and will follow its target, moving faster based on its proximity to '''Viktor'''. ''Chaos Storm'' can be recast at any time while the singularity is active.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Viktor''' directs the singularity to the target location. If cast on an enemy champion, the singularity will target that champion.
{{sbc|{{ai|Augment- Perfect Storm|Viktor|Augment: Perfect Storm}}:}} ''Chaos Storm'' moves 25% faster.
''Chaos Storm's recast can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Viktor conjures a singularity at the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and disrupting their channeled abilities. The singularity then remains active for 6.5 seconds, dealing magic damage to all enemies within its storm every second over the duration and granting sight of the area it covers. The singularity targets its nearest champion hit by its initial damage and will follow its target, moving faster based on its proximity to Viktor. Chaos Storm can be recast at any time while the singularity is active.
Recast: Viktor directs the singularity to the target location. If cast on an enemy champion, the singularity will target that champion.
Augment: Perfect Storm: Chaos Storm moves 25% faster.
Chaos Storm's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 250}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
{{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|65 to 145}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|100+65*6 to 250+145*6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50+45*6}}% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* The {{tip|disrupt}} is 'wrapped' into a status effect that says the target is {{tip|Silence|Silenced}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds, but it does not actually ''silence''. It however makes sure that the ''disrupt'' is prevented by {{tip|Cc-immune|immunity to silences}}.
* '''Viktor''' can command the singularity regardless of how far away he is from it. 
* The singularity will remain active even if '''Viktor''' dies. Any commands it was issued prior to his death will not be interrupted.
* ''Chaos Storm'' reaches its maximum speed at 300 units and minimum speed at 900 units away from '''Viktor'''.
* Including the initial damage, ''Chaos Storm'' deals 7 instances of damage.
* The storm will follow its target even if they are not {{tip|sight|visible}}, effectively giving away their position.
* ''Chaos Storm'' can be recast to follow '''Viktor'''. However, upon reaching him, the singularity will stop following '''Viktor'''.
* ''Chaos Storm'' is not obstructed by terrain.
